me.alexishaldy.db.connection

Class DBConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.alexishaldy.db.connection.DBConnection
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DBConnectionAdapter

    public abstract class DBConnection
extends Object
    This class is used as an interface which defines the operations to be done in the database. It is defined as part of the Adapter design pattern.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ronald T. Fernandez

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected String host
      Host where the database service is running.
      protected String pass
      User password used to authenticate the given user.
      protected String port
      Port where the database service is running.
      protected String user
      User login used to get connected to the database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected DBConnection(String host, String port, String user, String pass)
      Class constructor.

      abstract boolean execQuery(String query)
      This method is used for do anything in sql request

      This method allows getting the information contained in a table or as a result of a query.

      This method allows retrieving the database names that belong to the database manager.

    • Field Detail

      • host

        protected String host
        Host where the database service is running. It has the format host:port

      • port

        protected String port
        Port where the database service is running. It has the format host:port

      • user

        protected String user
        User login used to get connected to the database.

      • pass

        protected String pass
        User password used to authenticate the given user.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DBConnection

        protected DBConnection(String host,
                       String port,
                       String user,
                       String pass)
        Class constructor. The constructor is simply defined in order to initialize the attributes. Because the class is abstract, it will be never called directly except in the derived classes.
        Parameters:
        host - Host where the database service is running
        port - Port where the database service is running
        user - User login in order to get connected to the database
        pass - User password used to authenticate the given user

    • Method Detail

      • getTable

        public abstract Column getTable(String tableName)
                         throws DBException
        This method allows getting the information contain in a table
        Parameters:
        tableName - Name of the table whose information is being requested
        Returns:
        Table content retrieved from the database
        Throws:
        DBException - Throws an exception in case a problem with the DB has occurred

      • getList

        public abstract Vector<String> getList(String query)
                                throws DBException
        This method allows getting the information contained in a table or as a result of a query. The only constraint for this method is that the result can have one single column (otherwise, only the first column will be retrieved).
        Parameters:
        query - Query used to get the table with a single column
        Returns:
        Information retrieved after running the query
        Throws:
        DBException - Throws an exception in case a problem with the DB has occurred

      • getSystemDBs

        public abstract Map<String,Boolean> getSystemDBs()
                                          throws DBException
        This method allows retrieving the database names that belong to the database manager.
        Returns:
        Return a map with the database names as the index and "true" as the value.
        Throws:
        DBException - Throws an exception in case a problem with the DB has occurred

      • execQuery

        public abstract boolean execQuery(String query)
                           throws DBException
        This method is used for do anything in sql request
        Parameters:
        query - The request
        Returns:
        Result of query
        Throws:
        DBException - DBException Throws an exception in case a problem with the DB has occurred

      • selectQuery

        public abstract Vector<String> selectQuery(String query)
                                    throws DBException
        This method is used for SELECT in sql request
        Parameters:
        query - The select request
        Returns:
        The result of query
        Throws:
        DBException - DBException Throws an exception in case a problem with the DB has occurred
